name: Static Spy
description:
[Made over one weekend for Mini Jam 74

Theme - Chaos

Limitation - Game must only use the A, X, Space, P, 8 and B keys]

Greetings, Agent.

You are being sent a vital coded message. To avoid detection by hostile intelligence, you will receive this message via an old TV and matching antenna. Due to department-wide budget cuts, you have been assigned a crooked antenna and must use both hands to keep it straight and view the message. Type the message into your S-pi tablet.

You will be unable to straighten the antenna and record the secret message at the same time.*

Controls:

Hold [space] to straighten the antenna and view the incoming message.

Release [space] to hold your S-pi tablet .

[Type] to record the incoming characters.

*NOTE: this applies only to agents with 2 or less hands. If you have more than 2 hands you are required to declare any excess appendages to your immediate supervisor under Agent Directory ch. 4, subsec. 2, para. 2. Failure to do so will result in immediate termination.
